snippet.title: SNES Final Fantasy: Mystic Quest
snippet.description:
There may not be much love for this outing, wich was really only meant to introduce western gamers tothe RPG genre, but I have always found it to be quite charming, laid back RPG.

Love the music, and the sfx remind me of a NES game, It was indeed, my very first turn based, proper RPG. As such, for soo many criticism on part of people and I very well know that the other Final Fantasy SNES titles where far better, I still love this one.
